metadata.title: CVE-2017-12459 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The bfd_mach_o_read_symtab_strtab function in bfd/mach-o.c in the BinaryFile Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils2.29 and earlier, allows remote attackers to cause an out of bounds heapwrite and possibly achieve code execution via a crafted mach-o file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
